pages.text: Water is finite, so use it carefully!$(br2)You can stretch your water supply x4 by crafting a water bucket together with four empty bottles, or by putting it in a container.

Rain collects in cauldrons, clay barrels, basins, troughs, and water tanks. This is the only renewable way to get more water in the early game.$(br2)Even if an oasis has no water on the surface, there may be hidden pools in underground caves.
Water scooped out of a pond isn't good to drink. Boil water in a furnace to purify it.
Fruit juices are a good renewable way to stay hydrated. Put some fruit in a basin and stomp on it!$(br2)Drinking purified water restores more thirst, but juices give you helpful status effects.
You can drink cactus juice in a pinch, but in the long run it'll just make you thirstier.
Canteens hold three bottles of water, but only water.
